Naveen & Nils,
   Thank you very much. Naveen Thank you so much for
sending that junitsupport.jar file. Yes you are right
just I replaced that junitsupport.jar file and it
working fine now. If this is the case why the JUnit
people still allowing to download the buggy
junitsupport.jar file. I just downloaded that
yesterday.
 Thank you very much again.

Prasad Charasala


--- Naveen <ksankaran@...> wrote:
> It looks like there is bug in the jde, I got the
> fixed junitsupport.jar file
> from the one of the ibm news group, could remeber
> which one. any way try
> coping this to org.eclipse.jdt.junit on plugins
> directory. This should
> resolve the problem.
> 
> Good luck!
